name: Angela
review: Amazing place! Would love to come back when I visit the city again.

name: Antonio
review: Actually enjoyed the salad. Great setting.

name: Elisabeth
review: The fish was delicious, although a little bit cold.

name: Milton
review: You know, I'm really grateful, that you don't drown the food in sauce, but served it separately.

name: Rewboss
review: The fish was on point, but the drinks came back half empty. I don't mean to be a pessimist, but is this what I'm paying for?

name: Anna
review: Great place! Just sitting here enjoying a cut of coffee is enough to make my day much better.
